00029 #define PCPDefaultPort "/dev/pcr1000"
00031 #define PCPDefaultSpeed B9600
00032 
00034 
00038 struct PRadInf {
00040         char        PCPPort[64];
00042         tcflag_t    PCPSpeed;
00044         char        PCPInitSpeed[8];
00046         int         PCPVolume;
00048         int         PCPSquelch;
00050 
00051         pcrfreq_t   PCPFreq;
00053 
00054         pcrcmd_t    PCPMode[128];
00056 
00057         pcrcmd_t    PCPFilter[128];
00059         bool            PCPAutoUpdate;
00060 
00062         const char      *PCPToneSq;
00064         float       PCPToneSqFloat;
00066         bool            PCPAutoGain;
00068         bool            PCPNoiseBlank;
00070         bool            PCPRFAttenuator;
00071 };

00074 
00082 class PCP { 
00083     public:
00084         PCP(char *port=PCPDefaultPort, tcflag_t speed=PCPDefaultSpeed,
00085             const char *name=0);
00086         ~PCP();
00087 
00088         bool PCPInit(bool autoUpdate=false);
00089         bool PCPPowerUp();
00090         bool PCPPowerDown();
00091 
00092         // basic radio methods
00093         bool PCPSetSpeed(tcflag_t);
00094         bool PCPSetPort(const char *);
00095         bool PCPSetVolume(int);
00096         bool PCPSetSquelch(int);
00097         bool PCPSetFreq(pcrfreq_t);
00098         bool PCPSetMode(const char *);
00099         bool PCPSetFilter(const char *);
00100         int  PCPSigStrength();
00101         const char *PCPSigStrengthStr();
00102 
00103         // advanced radio methods
00104         bool PCPSetToneSq(const char*);
00105         bool PCPSetToneSq(float);
00106         bool PCPSetAutoGain(bool);
00107         bool PCPSetNB(bool);
00108         bool PCPSetRFAttenuator(bool);
00109 
00110         bool             PCPIsOn();
00111         bool             PCPQueryOn();
00112         bool             PCPQuerySquelch();
00113         const char      *PCPGetPort();
00114         tcflag_t         PCPGetSpeed_t();
00115         const char      *PCPGetSpeed();
00116         int              PCPGetVolume();
00117         const char      *PCPGetVolumeStr();
00118         int              PCPGetSquelch();
00119         const char      *PCPGetSquelchStr();
00120         pcrfreq_t        PCPGetFreq();
00121         const char      *PCPGetFreqStr();
00122         const pcrcmd_t  *PCPGetMode();
00123         const char      *PCPGetModeStr();
00124         const pcrcmd_t  *PCPGetFilter();
00125         const char      *PCPGetFilterStr();
00126 
00127         const char  *PCPGetToneSq();
00128         const char  *PCPGetToneSqStr();
00129         bool             PCPGetAutoGain();
00130         const char  *PCPGetAutoGainStr();
00131         bool             PCPGetNB();
00132         const char  *PCPGetNBStr();
00133         bool             PCPGetRFAttenuator();
00134         const char  *PCPGetRFAttenuatorStr();
00135 
00137 
00144         const PRadInf PCPGetRadioInfo();
00145 
00146     private:
00147         bool            PCPCheckResponse();
00148 
00150         PComm           *PCPComm;
00152         bool        PCPStatus;
00154         bool            PCPErrRead;
00156         char            PCPTemp[256];
00157 
00159         struct PRadInf *PCPRadio;
00160 };
